title: S5 Ep24: Male and female voices in economics
itunes:title: Male and female voices in economics
description: We know women are under-represented in economics. But if male economists are more comfortable expressing a strong opinion, does this increase the perceived imbalance? Sarah Smith tells Tim Phillips about new research into the difference between male and female voices in economics.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
